bibl.title: Consolidation, Innovation and Renaissance.
bibl.note: Concerns Egypt in the Late Period and under the Ptolemies. - Militarization. - Foreign Immigrants. - Urbanization. - Land Ownership. - Kings and Cults. - Industrialization. - ""Archaism"". - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Penelope Wilson, Consolidation, Innovation and Renaissance.
Willeke Wendrich (ed.), Egyptian Archaeology = Blackwell Studies in Global Archaeology (Malden, MA - Oxford - Chichester, 2010) pp. 241-258.

Concerns Egypt in the Late Period and under the Ptolemies. - Militarization. - Foreign Immigrants. - Urbanization. - Land Ownership. - Kings and Cults. - Industrialization. - ""Archaism"". - Conclusion.
